channel.title: Making NPC HP higher than 255 and recolred rares?
channel.description: I am trying to make the chaos elemental have high hp 900'ish for my server because he drops a white p hat. The max I can go to is 255. any suggestions? Also how would I go about making a black p hat? It would be great if someone had a tut or d/l.

item.title: Making NPC HP higher than 255 and recolred rares?
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

you need to make a public void to extend the max hp for npcs…
ill start one off for scratch for you- you do the rest

[code]public void NPCHp max extend(max int, int) {
addmaxHP = NPC.java maxhp.Add (9999, 1);
if (npcID = your npc id here);
apply add’maxHP;
} else {9
System.out.println(“Cannot extend max hp”)
{
}
}
}

[/code]
now change the npc id here to your npc id and it should work

Read full topic
item.source: Making NPC HP higher than 255 and recolred rares?

item.title: Making NPC HP higher than 255 and recolred rares?
item.dc:creator: @Jake_Ericson Jake Ericson
item.description:
@Jake_Ericson wrote:

Lord, I did but it has infinite HP.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 07, 2007, 07:11:33 PM[/size][hr]And cold, even if it is a new item it is still clientside?

item.title: Making NPC HP higher than 255 and recolred rares?
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

Black Phats are Client sided…Which means, unless you have built a client your out of luck.

item.title: Making NPC HP higher than 255 and recolred rares?
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Gold Lord Gold
item.description:
@Lord_Gold wrote:

Go to npc.cfg and hit ctrl.f and type the npc id for the monster and above it should say hp just change it to the amount you want.
